pageContext.description:
Porthleven is a historic fishing port located to the west of the Lizard Peninsula in Cornwall and was certified as a harbour in 1825. On the night of 12th December 1978 a police patrol car was swept into the harbour during a heavey storm, killing the two police constables inside.

Original watercolour, image size 12" x 10".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £40
pageContext.metaDescription: Watercolour Painting of Porthleven, Cornwall. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.
